name: Campfire (tktk27)
description:
The Skeleton King is hot on your trail, and starvation isn't far behind him... Can you and your son survive the night?

The music is Mozart's Requiem no.7 Lacrimosa, slightly altered of course :)

If you would like more insight about this short bitsy game for whatever reason, I'll be posting some more info on https://www.tumblr.com/blog/thiswebsiteisthebaneofmyexistenc
